entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023
